main.java.embl.rieslab.emu.controller

Class SystemController

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.java.embl.rieslab.emu.controller.SystemController

  • public class SystemController
extends java.lang.Object
    EMU controller class, bridging Micro-manager and the EMU UIPlugins using a configuration controller. Upon starting, it extracts the Micro-Manager device properties and configuration groups using an instance of MMRegistry. It then checks the available UIPlugin through an UIPluginLoader. It also makes use of a ConfigurationController to read the plugin configurations. Finally, it extracts the UIProperties and UIParameters from the loaded plugin and pair them to the corresponding MMProperties or state values. During running time, it can update the properties and change the current plugin or configuration.
    Author:
    Joran Deschamps
